mapper.select: select stId, stName, stAge, stPhoneNo, stGender, stClass, stHome from student;
mapper.insert: insert into student(stName, stAge, stPhoneNo, stGender, stClass, stHome) values (#{stName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stAge, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stPhoneNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stGender, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stClass}, #{stHome})
mapper.update: update student set stName =#{stName}, stAge = #{stAge}, stPhoneNo= #{stPhoneNo}, stGender=#{stGender}, stClass =#{stClass} where stId = #{stId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
